newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Institutions hold more Portuguese shares - bourse.
newsitem.headline: Institutions hold more Portuguese shares - bourse.

text.p: Portuguese institutional investors boosted savings from 1993 to 1996 and increased their holdings of Portuguese stocks, a report by Lisbon bourse said.

Investment funds boosted their holdings of Portuguese shares by 65.2 percent between 1993 and 1996. Pension funds held 145 billion escudos worth of shares in 1996, having increased their share holdings by an average 24.2 percent from 1994 to 1996.
